title: Which type of pages can I start on Instagram? - Quora

response.answer_text: there are lot of things you can do in instagram and earn and make your fame.creating page is one of the activity of instagram .creating page is easy but make more followers and growing is not easy because people follow or like your post if your post are unique and they have some qualities.NOTE: for growing your page most important thing is that where is your interest which type of activity you like. We should make a page in which we are interested.FOR EXAMPLE :if your interest in fashion but you created a page related to shayri or shayri page(poetry).so you can not handle this and you can post everyday so it depnds on your interest which type of page you choose for your help i give you some ideas which is given below MEMESPOETRYRELATED TO FOODBLOGGFASHION INFLUENCERPHOTOGRAPHYEDITING -if you know how to edit like photoshopRELATIONSHIP ADVISORBUSINESS ADVISORSPORTSTOURSCIENTIFIC FACTSTORY WRITTINGFUNNY CARTOONSMOTIVATIONAL PAGESHORT HOT ViDEOS PAGERELATED TO FITNESSYOGADANCETECH

A2A. This definetly depends on your interest. meme pages - if you are very creative and funny.photography pages - if you are a good photographer and click outstanding pictures.if you have any small scale or large scale business you can open a instagram page for it to promote.if you are a good writer, you can have an Instagram page where you can post your writings.if you are a foodie you can use Instagram to share the pictures of different cuisines of food and all the fancy places you visit.if you are too much into fashion. you can start a page posting your outfits and other fashion stuff.these are the comman categories of pages found in instagram.
